page.title: 07TRADE| Shops
page.content: There are only two shops in our area, both in Lewknor. One is a general store selling groceries, stationary, sweets and cigarettes,and garden accessories,as well as being the Post Office. It has a good regular trade because it is the only local shop. In 1984 it was extended but it is now going to be sold, so we are not sure what will happen. The other shop is a specialist shop for agricultural machinery. Farrels draws its trade from a very wide area. It must do a lot of business because they have five computers!
